name: Bomberball (AngelMontanes)
description:
In Bomberball you will have to kick a lot of balls while you contain your desire to break the bombs.

Kick at the right time to get more score.

Be careful, it will be more and more frantic!

Sounds by : https://shapeforms.itch.io/shapeforms-audio-free-sfx

Model by : https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/bomberman-3af96d164a0442499f5b55164d511f93

Note: Game dedicated to a gamejam, it has no purpose of sale or income.
